Title: Anatomy Charts of the Arabs
Content: The Anatomy Charts of the Arabs are a collection of drawings described by Karl Sudhoff on 1908 Four charts the skeleton the muscles the blood vessels the organs are found in a 264folio illustrated manuscript N 500510Ah1110n14 in The Sami I Haddad Memorial Library  Rancho Palos Verdes Branch and N 90 in the Catalogue of the Arabic medical manuscripts in the Library of Dr Sami Ibrahim Haddad written by Farid Haddad and HH Biesterfeld Aleppo 1984 Parts of the texts were written in Arabic and other sections in Persian The scribe was either faJrald每n mahAbAd每 or muHammad C每r每n both are unknown physicians mentioned in the text The copy was made in Patna Bihar India sometime between 944 and 1110 AH  Gallery
